APRIL 7 TO 25, VIRGINIA Historic Garden Week. More than 30 tours throughout the state. (804) 644-7776; www.vagardenweek.org.

APRIL 12 TO 15, CHIANGMAI, THAILAND Songkran. To mark the start of the lunar new year, a free-for-all of water dousing of friends and strangers. (The elderly and statues of the Buddha are sprinkled respectfully.) (212) 432-0433; welcometo. chiangmai-chiangrai.com/sk-ny.htm.
APRIL 15 TO 18, NEW ORLEANS French Quarter Festival. Entertainment on 15 stages, about 80 food and beverage booths, courtyard tours and a parade. (800) 673-5725; www.fqfi.org.

APRIL 21, LONDON To mark the queens birthday, a 41-gun salute at noon in Hyde Park and a 62-gun salute at 1 p.m. at the Tower of London, both by the Kings Troop Royal Horse Artillery. (800) 462-2748; online at www.army.mod.uk.
